√sphṛ

present: [6.] sphuráti etc. V.+  sphuráte etc. B.+  

[perfect: pusphora  pusphure  ]

aorist: [1.] sphūryāt   -- [3.] aspusphurat   -- [5.] spharīs  asphorīt  

[future: sphuriṣyati  sphuritā  ]

verbal: sphurita E.+  sphulita  spharitvā  

secondary: intensive: posphur-   -- desiderative: pusphuriṣa-   -- causative: sphārayati etc. E.+  sphurayati  sphorayati  

derivatives: -sphur  -sphura V.+  -sphāra E.+  sphuraṇa S.+  -sphūrti C.  -sphulíṅga V.+  

Does not seem worth the attempt to divide into different roots, as the who.e considerable range of meanings appears in the forms of sphur.
